  • Method Details

    • introMenu

      public char introMenu()
      This menu prints out all Selections, The user would have to provide an input to select the selected Menu.
      Returns:
      introMenuOption The user input of their selection of the menus.

    • searchInventoryMenu

      public char searchInventoryMenu()
      This method displays the Search Method, prompts user for input and uses that input displays the specific methods relating to the user input.
      Returns:
      searchInventoryMenuOption This is the userInput used to display specific menus

    • printInventory

      public Toys printInventory(ArrayList<Toys> toyList) throws IOException
      Prints the contents of an ArrayList
      Parameters:
      toyList - This holds an arraylist that holds an amount of toys, that relates to the user input, being, if they want an Identical Serial Number, if their input contains with other toy names, or if it is the same Category.
      Returns:
      the specific toy that the user wants to purchase
      Throws:
      IOException - checks at a location, and looks if the file does exist

      This method prints a message, and continues User back to the starting screen.
      Throws:
      IOException - looks at a location, and checks if the file exists.

      public void isEnterPressed()
      This method displays a message, if the user input is an enter, continues user to the next method.
